languages.text: "Позвольте! Я прочитала множество книг по Астра Натарис и могу поклясться честью Дома Орселлио — ваши офицеры вносят данные совершенно не по уставу! Ложные термины, невыдержанные расстояние между строк, ошибки в элементарных словах. Я потратила несколько циклов, чтобы исправить последние записи в журнале и порадовать господина Абеляра, который так любит порядок".

traits.locale_text: "Позвольте! Я прочитала множество книг по Астра Натарис и могу поклясться честью Дома Орселлио — ваши офицеры вносят данные совершенно не по уставу! Ложные термины, невыдержанные расстояние между строк, ошибки в элементарных словах. Я потратила несколько циклов, чтобы исправить последние записи в журнале и порадовать господина Абеляра, который так любит порядок".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I beg to differ! I read numerous books on Astra Nataris and can swear on House Orsellio's honour that your officers are entering data in complete contravention of regulation! False terms, random distances between lines, spelling mistakes in even the simplest of words. I have spent the last few cycles correcting the latest log entries, and I thought it would please Master Abelard, as he is so fond of order."
languages.original_text: "Позвольте! Я прочитала множество книг по Астра Натарис и могу поклясться честью Дома Орселлио — ваши офицеры вносят данные совершенно не по уставу! Ложные термины, невыдержанные расстояние между строк, ошибки в элементарных словах. Я потратила несколько циклов, чтобы исправить последние записи в журнале и порадовать господина Абеляра, который так любит порядок".

traits.locale_text: "I beg to differ! I read plenty of books on Astra Nataris and can swear on House Orsellio's honor that your officers are entering data completely outside the regulations! False terms, random distance between the lines, spelling mistakes in even the simplest of words. I spent the last few cycles correcting the latest entries to please master Abelard who is so fond of orderliness."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I beg to differ! I read plenty of books on Astra Nataris and can swear on House Orsellio's honor that your officers are entering data completely outside the regulations! False terms, random distance between the lines, spelling mistakes in even the simplest of words. traits.locale_text: "I beg to differ! I read numerous books on Astra Nataris and can swear on House Orsellio's honour that your officers are entering data in complete contravention of regulation! False terms, random distances between lines, spelling mistakes in even the simplest of words. I have spent the last few cycles correcting the latest log entries, and I thought it would please Master Abelard, as he is so fond of order."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我不敢苟同！我读过许多关于星界导航方面的书籍。我可以以奥赛罗家族的荣耀发誓，你的军官在输入数据时完全违反了规定！不仅仅有术语错误，行与行之间的间距不一致，就连最简单的单词都存在拼写错误。在过去的几个周期里，我一直都在努力纠正最新的日志条目。我本以为，这应该会让阿贝拉德大师很开心，因为他是如此在乎秩序。”
languages.original_text: "I beg to differ! I read numerous books on Astra Nataris and can swear on House Orsellio's honour that your officers are entering data in complete contravention of regulation! False terms, random distances between lines, spelling mistakes in even the simplest of words. I have spent the last few cycles correcting the latest log entries, and I thought it would please Master Abelard, as he is so fond of order."

traits.locale_text: “我不敢苟同！我读过许多关于星界导航方面的书籍。我可以以奥塞罗家族的荣耀发誓，你的军官在输入数据时完全违反了规定！不仅仅有术语错误，行与行之间的间距不一致，就连最简单的单词都存在拼写错误。在过去的几个周期里，我一直都在努力纠正最新的日志条目。我本以为，这应该会让阿贝拉德大师很开心，因为他是如此在乎秩序。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡No estoy de acuerdo! He leído numerosos textos sobre Astra Nataris, ¡y estoy dispuesta a jurar por el honor de la casa Orsellio que sus oficiales anotan los datos de forma contraria a la regulación! Errores terminológicos, una separación entre líneas completamente aleatoria y errores ortográficos en las palabras más sencillas. He pasado los últimos ciclos corrigiendo las entradas más recientes de la bitácora y pensaba que agradaría al maestro Abelard, que tanto aprecia el orden».
languages.original_text: "I beg to differ! I read numerous books on Astra Nataris and can swear on House Orsellio's honour that your officers are entering data in complete contravention of regulation! False terms, random distances between lines, spelling mistakes in even the simplest of words. I have spent the last few cycles correcting the latest log entries, and I thought it would please Master Abelard, as he is so fond of order."

traits.locale_text: «¡No estoy de acuerdo! He leído numerosos textos sobre Astra Nataris, ¡y estoy dispuesta a jurar por el honor de la casa Orsellio que sus oficiales anotan los datos de forma contraria a la regulación! Errores terminológicos, una separación entre líneas completamente aleatoria y errores ortográficos en las palabras más sencillas. He pasado los últimos ciclos corrigiendo las entradas más recientes de la bitácora y pensaba que agradaría al maestro Abelard, que tanto aprecia el orden».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「そうではありません！あたくしはアストラ・ナタリスに関する本を何冊も読みましたが、オーセリオ家の名誉にかけて誓えるのは、あなた様方の士官が規定に完全に反してデータを入力しているということです！虚偽の用語、行と行の間の不規則な距離、最も単純な単語でさえ誤字があります。あたくしはここ数周期を費やして、最新の日誌を訂正してきました。アベラルドさんは秩序がお好きなので、喜んでいただけると思ったのですが…」
languages.original_text: "I beg to differ! I read numerous books on Astra Nataris and can swear on House Orsellio's honour that your officers are entering data in complete contravention of regulation! False terms, random distances between lines, spelling mistakes in even the simplest of words. I have spent the last few cycles correcting the latest log entries, and I thought it would please Master Abelard, as he is so fond of order."

traits.locale_text: 「そうではありません！あたくしはアストラ・ナタリスに関する本を何冊も読みましたが、オーセリオ家の名誉にかけて誓えるのは、あなた様方の士官が規定に完全に反してデータを入力しているということです！虚偽の用語、行と行の間の不規則な距離、最も単純な単語でさえ誤字があります。あたくしはここ数周期を費やして、最新の日誌を訂正してきました。アベラルドさんは秩序がお好きなので、喜んでいただけると思ったのですが…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Das sehe ich anders! Ich habe zahlreiche Bücher über Astra Nataris gelesen und schwöre bei der Ehre des Hauses Orsellio, dass Eure Offiziere Dateneingaben vornehmen, die überhaupt nicht den Regeln entsprechen! Falsche Begriffe, zufällige Zeilenabstände, Rechtschreibfehler in einfachsten Wörtern. Ich habe die letzten Zyklen damit verbracht, die neuesten Logeinträge zu korrigieren, in der Annahme, es würde Meister Abelard gefallen, da ihm Ordnung doch so wichtig ist."
languages.original_text: "I beg to differ! I read numerous books on Astra Nataris and can swear on House Orsellio's honour that your officers are entering data in complete contravention of regulation! False terms, random distances between lines, spelling mistakes in even the simplest of words. I have spent the last few cycles correcting the latest log entries, and I thought it would please Master Abelard, as he is so fond of order."

traits.locale_text: "Das sehe ich anders! Ich habe zahlreiche Bücher über Astra Nataris gelesen und schwöre bei der Ehre des Hauses Orsellio, dass Eure Offiziere Dateneingaben vornehmen, die überhaupt nicht den Regeln entsprechen! Falsche Begriffe, zufällige Zeilenabstände, Rechtschreibfehler in einfachsten Wörtern. Ich habe die letzten Zyklen damit verbracht, die neuesten Logeinträge zu korrigieren, in der Annahme, es würde Meister Abelard gefallen, da ihm Ordnung doch so wichtig ist."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est totalement faux ! J'ai beaucoup lu sur Astra Nataris, et je jure sur l'honneur de la maison Orsellio que les données reportées par vos officiers étaient en complète violation des régulations ! Termes erronés, écarts aléatoires entre les lignes, fautes d'orthographe des plus élémentaires... Ces derniers cycles, j'ai donc pris sur moi de corriger les entrées du journal, en pensant que Maître Abélard s'en réjouirait, lui qui aime tant l'ordre. »
languages.original_text: "I beg to differ! I read numerous books on Astra Nataris and can swear on House Orsellio's honour that your officers are entering data in complete contravention of regulation! False terms, random distances between lines, spelling mistakes in even the simplest of words. I have spent the last few cycles correcting the latest log entries, and I thought it would please Master Abelard, as he is so fond of order."

traits.locale_text: « C'est totalement faux ! J'ai beaucoup lu sur Astra Nataris, et je jure sur l'honneur de la maison Orsellio que les données reportées par vos officiers étaient en complète violation des régulations ! Termes erronés, écarts aléatoires entre les lignes, fautes d'orthographe des plus élémentaires... Ces derniers cycles, j'ai donc pris sur moi de corriger les entrées du journal, en pensant que Maître Abélard s'en réjouirait, lui qui aime tant l'ordre. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hiç de bile! Astra Nataris üzerine sayısız kitap okumuş olup Orsellio Hanesi'nin onuru üzerine yemin edebilirim ki subaylarının veri giriş şekli, yönetmelikleri düpedüz ihlal ediyor! Yanlış terimler, rastgele satırlar arası mesafeler, en basit kelimelerde bile yapılan yazım yanlışları. Son birkaç döngüyü yakın zamanda girilen kayıt girdilerini düzelterek geçirdim ve düzenden hoşlanan Üstat Abelard'ın da bundan hoşnut kalacağını düşündüm."
languages.original_text: "I beg to differ! I read numerous books on Astra Nataris and can swear on House Orsellio's honour that your officers are entering data in complete contravention of regulation! False terms, random distances between lines, spelling mistakes in even the simplest of words. I have spent the last few cycles correcting the latest log entries, and I thought it would please Master Abelard, as he is so fond of order."

traits.locale_text: "Katılamayacağım! Astra Nataris üzerine sayısız kitap okumuşumdur ve Orsellio Hanesi'nin onuru üzerine yemin edebilirim ki subaylarının veri giriş şekli, yönetmelikleri düpedüz ihlal ediyor! Yanlış terimler, rastgele satırlar arası mesafeler, en basit kelimelerde bile yapılan yazım yanlışları. Son birkaç döngüyü yakın zamanda girilen kayıt girdilerini düzelterek geçirdim ve düzenden hoşlanan Üstat Abelard'ın da bundan hoşnut kalacağını düşündüm."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
